Desc.entry: All year round gallery space for exhibitions in the foyer area of an artists studios complex. The actual artists studios are open twice a year for viewing by the public. Programme of exhibitions is available on the website.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Wed & Fri 10am-5pm, Thurs 10.45am-5pm, Sat & Sun closed

category.entry: ART GALLERIES, ART WORKSHOPS AND STUDIOS FOR HIRE
